title: Virtus investment partners plans ETF expansions and highlights strong equity performance amid market challenges

Earnings Call Insights: Virtus Investment Partners (VRTS) Q1 2025

Management View

  • CEO George Aylward highlighted the challenges in the first quarter due to market volatility, resulting in lower assets under management (AUM) and net outflows. Despite this, the company achieved higher earnings per share compared
